languages.text: Орден Молота возвысился и обрел мощь благодаря покровительству Вольного Торговца. Почитание Когнация столь распространилось, что он потеснил Друза-Воина на постаменте самого почитаемого святого Простора. Друзианский культ не простил сего, и между церквями началась вражда, но воинственные служители Молота не страшились кровопролития.

The Order of the Hammer grew in power and prominence thanks to the Rogue Trader's patronage. So widespread was the reverence for Cognatius that he supplanted Drusus the Warrior on his pedestal as the most honoured saint in the Expanse. The Drusian cult did not forgive this, and feuds broke out between the clergies, but the warlike servants of the Hammer were not afraid of bloodshed.
languages.original_text: Орден Молота возвысился и обрел мощь благодаря покровительству Вольного Торговца. Почитание Когнация столь распространилось, что он потеснил Друза-Воина на постаменте самого почитаемого святого Простора. Друзианский культ не простил сего, и между церквями началась вражда, но воинственные служители Молота не страшились кровопролития.

traits.locale_text: The Order of the Hammer grew in power and prominence thanks to the Rogue Trader's patronage. So widespread was the reverence of Cognatius that he supplanted Drusus the Warrior on the pedestal of the most worshipped saint in the Expanse. The Drusian cult did not forgive this, and feuds broke out between the churches, but the warlike servants of the Hammer were not afraid of bloodshed.

So widespread was the reverence of Cognatius that he supplanted Drusus the Warrior on the pedestal of the most worshipped saint in the Expanse. The Drusian cult did not forgive this, and feuds broke out between the churches, but the warlike servants of the Hammer were not afraid of bloodshed.

The Order of the Hammer grew in power and prominence thanks to the Rogue Trader's patronage. So widespread was the reverence for Cognatius that he supplanted Drusus the Warrior on his pedestal as the most worshipped saint in the Expanse. The Drusian cult did not forgive this, and feuds broke out between the churches, but the warlike servants of the Hammer were not afraid of bloodshed.

The Order of the Hammer grew in power and prominence thanks to the Rogue Trader's patronage. So widespread was the reverence for Cognatius that he supplanted Drusus the Warrior on his pedestal as the most worshipped saint in the Expanse. The Drusian cult did not forgive this, and feuds broke out between the churches, but the warlike servants of the Hammer were not afraid of bloodshed.

The Order of the Hammer grew in power and prominence thanks to the Rogue Trader's patronage. So widespread was the reverence for Cognatius that he supplanted Drusus the Warrior on his pedestal as the most honoured saint in the Expanse. The Drusian cult did not forgive this, and feuds broke out between the clergies, but the warlike servants of the Hammer were not afraid of bloodshed.

languages.text: 在行商浪人的赞助下，重锤修会的实力与声望不断扩张。无数人对圣科尼亚蒂乌斯充满了敬仰，而他也取代了勇士德鲁苏斯，成为了整个科罗努斯扩区最受尊崇的圣人。德鲁苏斯教派无法原谅这样的篡权行为，与重锤修会之间爆发了争斗，但重锤修会的仆人们从不惧怕流血。
languages.original_text: The Order of the Hammer grew in power and prominence thanks to the Rogue Trader's patronage. So widespread was the reverence for Cognatius that he supplanted Drusus the Warrior on his pedestal as the most honoured saint in the Expanse. The Drusian cult did not forgive this, and feuds broke out between the clergies, but the warlike servants of the Hammer were not afraid of bloodshed.

traits.locale_text: 在行商浪人的赞助下，重锤修会的实力与声望不断扩张。无数人对圣科尼亚蒂乌斯充满了敬仰，而他也取代了勇士德鲁苏斯，成为了整个科罗努斯扩区最受崇拜的圣人。德鲁苏斯教派无法原谅这样的篡权行为，与重锤修会之间爆发了争斗，但重锤修会的仆人们从不惧怕流血。

languages.text: 鉄槌の修道会は自由開拓者の支援により権力と名声を得た。あまりにコグナティウスへの畏敬の念が広がったことで、戦士ドラサスはエクスパンスで最も崇拝されている聖人としての地位から引き摺り下ろされた。ドルスス教団はこれを許さず、聖職者たちの間で不和が発生したが、鉄槌の好戦的なしもべ達は流血沙汰など恐れてはいなかった。
languages.original_text: The Order of the Hammer grew in power and prominence thanks to the Rogue Trader's patronage. So widespread was the reverence for Cognatius that he supplanted Drusus the Warrior on his pedestal as the most honoured saint in the Expanse. The Drusian cult did not forgive this, and feuds broke out between the clergies, but the warlike servants of the Hammer were not afraid of bloodshed.

traits.locale_text: 鉄槌の修道会は自由開拓者の支援により権力と名声を得た。あまりにコグナティウスへの畏敬の念が広がったことで、戦士ドラサスはエクスパンスで最も崇拝されている聖人としての地位から引き摺り下ろされた。ドルスス教団はこれを許さず、聖職者たちの間で不和が発生したが、鉄槌の好戦的なしもべ達は流血沙汰など恐れてはいなかった。

languages.text: L'Ordre du Marteau gagna en pouvoir et en attention grâce à la protection {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Son culte se répandit tant que Cognatius remplaça Drusus le Guerrier sur son piédestal comme saint le plus honoré des Étendues. Le culte drusien ne pardonna pas cet affront, si bien que des querelles éclatèrent entre les clergés, mais les serviteurs belliqueux du Marteau ne craignaient pas de faire couler le sang.
languages.original_text: The Order of the Hammer grew in power and prominence thanks to the Rogue Trader's patronage. So widespread was the reverence for Cognatius that he supplanted Drusus the Warrior on his pedestal as the most honoured saint in the Expanse. The Drusian cult did not forgive this, and feuds broke out between the clergies, but the warlike servants of the Hammer were not afraid of bloodshed.

traits.locale_text: L'Ordre du Marteau gagna en pouvoir et en attention grâce à la protection {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Son culte se répandit tant que Cognatius remplaça Drusus le Guerrier sur son piédestal comme saint le plus vénéré des Étendues. Le culte drusien ne pardonna pas cet affront, si bien que des querelles éclatèrent entre les églises, mais les serviteurs belliqueux du Marteau ne craignaient pas de faire couler le sang.

languages.text: La Orden del Martillo creció en poder e importancia gracias al apoyo de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Tanto se impuso la adoración a Cognatius que llegó a derrocar a Drusus el Guerrero de su pedestal como santo más venerado de la Extensión. El culto drusiano no se lo perdonó y se produjeron enfrentamientos entre ambos cultos, pero los belicosos sirvientes del Martillo no se amedrentaban ante ningún derramamiento de sangre.
languages.original_text: The Order of the Hammer grew in power and prominence thanks to the Rogue Trader's patronage. So widespread was the reverence for Cognatius that he supplanted Drusus the Warrior on his pedestal as the most honoured saint in the Expanse. The Drusian cult did not forgive this, and feuds broke out between the clergies, but the warlike servants of the Hammer were not afraid of bloodshed.

traits.locale_text: La Orden del Martillo creció en poder e importancia gracias al apoyo de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Tanto se impuso la adoración a Cognatius que llegó a derrocar a Drusus el Guerrero de su pedestal como santo más venerado de la Extensión. El culto drusiano no se lo perdonó y se produjeron enfrentamientos entre ambas iglesias, pero los belicosos sirvientes del Martillo no se amedrentaban ante ningún derramamiento de sangre.

languages.text: Der Orden des Hammers gewann dank der Unterstützung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} an Macht und Einfluss. Die Verehrung von Cognatius war irgendwann so weit verbreitet, dass er Drusus den Krieger auf dem Podest des meistangebeteten Heiligen in der Ausdehnung ablöste. Das hat ihm der Drusus-Kult nie verziehen, und zwischen den beiden Lagern kam es zu Fehden. Doch die kriegerischen Diener des Hammers fürchteten das Blutvergießen nicht.
languages.original_text: The Order of the Hammer grew in power and prominence thanks to the Rogue Trader's patronage. So widespread was the reverence for Cognatius that he supplanted Drusus the Warrior on his pedestal as the most honoured saint in the Expanse. The Drusian cult did not forgive this, and feuds broke out between the clergies, but the warlike servants of the Hammer were not afraid of bloodshed.

traits.locale_text: Der Orden des Hammers gewann dank der Unterstützung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} an Macht und Einfluss. Die Verehrung von Cognatius war irgendwann so weit verbreitet, dass er Drusus den Krieger auf dem Podest des meistangebeteten Heiligen in der Ausdehnung ablöste. Das hat ihm der Drusus-Kult nie verziehen, und zwischen den Kirchen kam es zu Fehden, doch die kriegerischen Diener des Hammers fürchteten das Blutvergießen nicht.

languages.text: Çekiç Tarikatı, Hür Tacir'in hamiliği sayesinde güçlendi ve daha önemli bir konuma erişti. Cognatius'a öyle çok yerde hürmet duyulmaya başlandı ki Enginlik'teki en değer gören aziz olan Savaşçı Drusus'un yerini aldı. Drususçu tarikatı, bu durumu hoş karşılamadı. Ruhban sınıfları arasında çatışmalar baş gösterirken Çekiç'in savaşa aşina hizmetkârları, kan dökmekten çekinmedi.
languages.original_text: The Order of the Hammer grew in power and prominence thanks to the Rogue Trader's patronage. So widespread was the reverence for Cognatius that he supplanted Drusus the Warrior on his pedestal as the most honoured saint in the Expanse. The Drusian cult did not forgive this, and feuds broke out between the clergies, but the warlike servants of the Hammer were not afraid of bloodshed.

traits.locale_text: Çekiç Tarikatı, Hür Tacir'in hamiliği sayesinde güçlendi ve daha önemli bir konum kazandı. Cognatius'a duyulan hürmet öylesine yayıldı ki, Enginlik'deki en değer gören aziz olan Savaşçı Drusus'un yerini aldı. Drususçu tarikatı bunu hoş karşılamadı ve ruhban sınıfları arasında çatışmalar baş gösterdi ancak Çekiç'in savaşa âşina hizmetkârları, kan dökmekten çekinmeyecekti.
